Broadband & Public WiFi in Turkey

Broadband internet has transformed Turkey's digital landscape, improving speeds and accessibility across the country.

The expansion of broadband internet has played a crucial role in shaping Turkey’s digital infrastructure. The transition from dial-up to ADSL, followed by the introduction of fiber-optic networks, enabled faster and more reliable internet access. Public WiFi networks have also grown rapidly, allowing people to connect on the go in cafes, airports, and public spaces. This section covers the milestones of Turkey’s broadband revolution and the rise of public internet access.
